name: Guitarded T-Shirt
description:
Purchase your own "Guitarded" T-shirt!


The custom Guitarded font contains 6 individual 'string' forms within each letter. Strings E, A, D and G, are 'wrapped,' in gold ink, while B and E are silver ink. 2-Color (silver and gold) printing, charcoal cotton tees. All sizes are unisex.
Shirt does not make mind-melting, tasty licks, though wearer may. Consult wearer before finger-tapping letterforms.


PLEASE REVIEW OUR RETURN & PRIVACY POLICIES BEFORE PURCHASING.


©2011 Erik Hartley, Orangehart Records

name: Drumass T-Shirt
description:
Purchase your own "Drumass" T-shirt!


The custom Drumass font was inspired by, and translated from, real, broken drum-sticks. Special thanks to Minx Studio for loaning me their box of sticks before recycling. 3-Color printing, black cotton tees. All sizes are unisex.
Shirt does not cause splinters, though heavy beats from wearer may. Consult wearer before playing with his or her sticks.


PLEASE REVIEW OUR RETURN & PRIVACY POLICIES BEFORE PURCHASING.


©2011 Erik Hartley, Orangehart Records

name: Basstard T-Shirt
description:
Purchase your own "Basstard" T-shirt!


The custom Basstard font contains 4 individual 'string' forms within each letter. All strings are 'wrapped,' in silver ink. 1-Color (silver) printing, red cotton tees. All sizes are unisex.
Shirt does not make earth shattering bass-tones, though wearer may. Consult wearer before slap and popping letterforms.


PLEASE REVIEW OUR RETURN & PRIVACY POLICIES BEFORE PURCHASING.


©2011 Erik Hartley, Orangehart Records
